original_title: 学生時代に僕をイジメていたあの女に復讐。「もう、イってるから許してください…あぁまたイっちゃう…」と壊れたようにイキまくっても僕は犯し続けた。
overview: This arrogant, high-paying girl used to bully me when I was a student. She will rape that woman who looks down on people other than herself and make her my slave.
title: Revenge on that woman who bullied me when I was a student. "Please forgive me because I'm already here... Oh, I'm going again..."
